Configuration

In order to connect Rakound to the neo4j database, parameters need to be specify in the file config/config.ini.

$ cat config/config.ini
[Database]
uri = bolt://localhost:7687/
user = neo4j
password = neo4j

  • uri: bolt URI formated as “bolt://IP:Port/” (Default: bolt://localhost:7687/)

  • user: neo4j user (Default: neo4j)

  • password: neo4j password (Default: neo4j)

If parameters are not specified in the configuration file, Rakound will ask you to specify them on startup.
